pr_title: Move semgrep-core dynamic version to own untracked file

timeline.message:
Move semgrep-core dynamic version to own untracked file

Previously this was done by using sed to modify a special string but
was causing issues when commiting changes in Main.ml. Instead we read from
a version.ml file and write to that file during make.

timeline.bodyText:
I try to avoid open. I just do it for Common and when you really need to reference lots of entities
from another file (e.g., I often do open Ast_xxx), but here I think it's better to qualify at use time and
do Version.version
